name: Navigator Extension
summary: Learn about .NEX files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Extensions (not to be confused with file extensions) are small software programs that can customize the functions of your web browser using coding language like JavaScript and HTML.
If you have created the .OEX file format for Opera 11 and 12 web browsers you should convert them to the Chromium-based Opera 15 browser format, which is NEX and .CRX.
NOTE: Opera runs Chromium's CRX files as long as the extension uses the chrome specific APIs that Opera supports.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
